official_title: A bill to authorize and direct the Secretary of the Army to correct certain erosion problems along the banks of the Warrior River near Moundville, Alabama.
short_title: Mound State Park Erosion Correction Act of 1983

summary.text: Mound State Park Erosion Correction Act of 1983 - Directs the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to take measures to control streambank erosion on the Warrior River in order to protect Mound State Park, Alabama. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Mound State Park Erosion Correction Act of 1983
A bill to authorize and direct the Secretary of the Army to correct certain erosion problems along the banks of the Warrior River near Moundville, Alabama.
